content.body: so I just noticed that the parameter to Iterator.prototype.{take,drop} is coerced to a number since it predates our decision to stop coercing parameters
is there any appetite from implementations to change that to stop coercing before anybody ends up using it? @shuyuguo:matrix.org @dminor:mozilla.org @linusgroh:matrix.org
content.formatted_body: is there any appetite from implementations to change that to stop coercing before anybody ends up using it? @shu @dminor @linusg

content.body: not at this time from me
I'm open to any last minute changes if they align proposals with new rules (including temporal) but I'm an outlier in that regard ðŸ˜„
